attributes.action: Nigel Farage should be knighted. Sir Nigel Farage KBE
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage has changed the UK and the world for the better. He has tirelessly dedicated himself to the human race. In the final hours of the EU referendum he doubted his country supported him but we proved otherwise. The future is rich thanks to this man's selfless sacrifice and we owe him every accolade. Knight Sir Nigel Farage.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage should be knighted. He tirelessly led the UK to victory in the EU referendum and should be given the title he deserves: Sir Nigel Farage KBE, Knight Commander of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
